description:
Cavendish has to make a difficult decision when the severely wounded Law begs him to be left behind. Meanwhile, seeing even his Second Gear or Third Gear attacks aren`t working against Doflamingo, Luffy decides to use his ultimate technique!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Anger Erupts! I Will Take Everything Upon Myself!
Der Ärger bricht aus – Ich werde alles auf mich nehmen
Explosion de colère. Je prendrai tout sur moi
Ikari Bakuhatsu: Ore ga Zenbu Hikiukeru
Вспышка ярости. Я всё возьму на себя!
انفجار الغضب! سأنجز كلّ شيء بنفسي!
怒り爆発 おれが全部引き受ける
